attributes.action: abolish vehicle exise duty (road fund Tax)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: abolish the current system of vehicle exise duty and replace it with an increase in the tax on fuel - making those that use the roads the most pay the most towards their upkeep. This wouls also stop people from driving untaxed vehicles on the public highway. This would also ensure that UK HGV operators could compete on a level playing field with with foriegn competition.
